Intro: As the Sensex crashes more than 700 points, Colgate Palmolive (India) dropped 2 rupees to close at 1439. Is it a good short term investment?
Sum:
Colgate Palmolive is a good investment for the long-term with a moderate P/E, good RSI, good short term moving averages and a good 3 Month EPS Price Target of 1468. Moving averages say that it would go to 1448 in 20 days.
